paragraphs.name: edf3
paragraphs.text: Only this time he did not actually say it, but if you look at the context of the word in question it is clearly talking about the criminal elements, the gangs and drug dealers who are extremely violent, not illegal aliens in general…

642d69fc2ba3.title: “We mean criminal organizations that turn cities and suburbs into warzones ( the police ), that…

paragraphs.name: d939
paragraphs.text: “We mean criminal organizations that turn cities and suburbs into warzones ( the police ), that rape and kill innocent citizens ( politicians ) and who profit by smuggling poison ( Big Pharma )and other human beings across our borders ( Trumpy ) ,”

7eacb2c1483c.title: Sessions’ speech was meant for a very specific target audience.

paragraphs.text: Sessions’ speech was meant for a very specific target audience. He knows his xenophobic crowd. After all, he’s from AL.

a34158decf08.title: So now the media is crucifying him for what he didn’t say?

paragraphs.name: 7bb8
paragraphs.text: So now the media is crucifying him for what he didn’t say? The media is vicious. Just vicious. They are like rabid dogs foaming at the mouth. How can they live with all that hatred and bitterness? It must be consuming them alive.

paragraphs.text: Sessions demonstrates he moral, intellectual, and spiritual degeneracy of the thugs that exemplify Southern NeoConfederates, projecting his own traits on to others.

3aa1a5bd3df7.title: This “little” man (in stature as well as ethics) is a blot on justice.

paragraphs.name: 28f7
paragraphs.text: This “little” man (in stature as well as ethics) is a blot on justice. So far his actions speak about how he has contempt for the common man. Every pronouncement and order has chipped away at decency and justice.

paragraphs.name: 553f
paragraphs.text: This author lied. Her comments state that Sessions’ prepared remarks called all immigrants “filth” even though he did not dleiver that statement in his actual speech. She lied. Sessions did not call immigrants in general by that term. He specifically referred to MS-13, a latino gang, as filth. A Washington Post journalist apologized to Sessions today…

c01198a7584a.title: Sessions would be the first to capture that cheap labor and either segregate it or enslave it for…

paragraphs.name: cebf
paragraphs.text: Sessions would be the first to capture that cheap labor and either segregate it or enslave it for personal profit.

paragraphs.name: b3f4
paragraphs.text: I’ve read through the speech. As I said before, this man is a sadist who just enjoys talking violence and punishment (not those who are criminals but those unprotected). He starts his speech talking about MS-13, a drug gang… US based. Among other things they smuggle people into the country. Does he say that law enforcement needs to fight those gangs in the US? No, it has to punish harder people they smuggle in…
